trans-unit.source: Provides a way to determine whether a value is greater than or less than a specified value, or whether a value is between two specified values.
trans-unit.target: 使您能够确定值是否大于或小于指定值，或某个值是否两个指定值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender> control provides the ability to filter data in a Web page by using classes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions> namespace.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender>控件通过使用中的类提供在网页中的筛选器数据的能力<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions>命名空间。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender>

trans-unit.source: These classes include the RangeExpression class.
trans-unit.target: 这些类包括 RangeExpression 类。

trans-unit.source: The RangeExpression class searches a data column using a pair of values that define the range.
trans-unit.target: RangeExpression 类使用的定义范围的值对数据列中搜索。

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeExpression.DataField%2A> property to specify the column to search.
trans-unit.target: 你使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeExpression.DataField%2A>属性来指定要搜索的列。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeExpression.DataField%2A>

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeExpression.MinType%2A> property to specify whether to include or exclude the minimum in the search results, and you use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeExpression.MaxType%2A> property to specify whether to include or exclude the maximum value.
trans-unit.target: 你使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeExpression.MinType%2A>属性可指定是否要包含或排除在搜索中的最小结果，并且你使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeExpression.MaxType%2A>属性可指定是否要包含或排除的最大值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeExpression.MaxType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeExpression.MinType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum and minimum values can be specified in [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] controls and the values can then be passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender> control as parameters in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> controls.
trans-unit.target: 可以在指定的最大和最小值[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]控件和值然后可以传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender>控件中的参数作为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender>

trans-unit.source: The results are typically displayed in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 通常在数据绑定控件中显示结果。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeExpression"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeExpression"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the field to use for the comparison.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要用于比较的字段。

trans-unit.source: The range expression searches data field for the specified range.
trans-unit.target: 范围表达式进行搜索指定范围内的数据字段。

trans-unit.source: The field to use for the comparison.
trans-unit.target: 要用于比较的字段。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object that the range comparison was performed on.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>范围比较已对执行的对象。</xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>

trans-unit.source: This method uses the specified <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object to resolve the expression.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用指定<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>对象解析表达式。</xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>

trans-unit.source: The object to use for the comparison.
trans-unit.target: 要用于比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object that the expression was applied to.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>表达式已应用于的对象。</xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeExpression.DataField*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>. -or- The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeExpression.MinType*> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeExpression.MaxType*> properties are set to <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeType"></xref>. -or- The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeExpression.MinType*> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeExpression.MaxType*> property is not set to <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeType"></xref> and the parameter collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: The <>*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>. -或- <> </> *1> 和<> *1> 属性设置为<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeType"> </xref>。 -或- <> </> *1> 或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeExpression.MaxType*>属性未设置为<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeType"></xref>和参数集合为空。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeExpression.MaxType*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum value of the range.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置范围的最大值。

trans-unit.source: Possible values for this property are <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeType>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeType>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeType>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的可能值包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeType>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeType>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeType>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeType>

trans-unit.source: When the MaxType is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeType>, the maximum value of the range is included in the search results.
trans-unit.target: 当 MaxType 设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeType>，搜索结果中包括的范围的最大值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeType>

trans-unit.source: This is equivalent to performing a >= operation.
trans-unit.target: 这相当于执行&1;> = 操作。

trans-unit.source: If you set the property to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeType> field, it is equivalent to specifying a > or < operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果将属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeType>字段，它等效于指定&1;> 或< operation.></ operation.></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeType>

trans-unit.source: If you set the property to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeType>, no limit is imposed on the range.
trans-unit.target: 如果将属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeType>，对范围施加没有限制。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeType>

trans-unit.source: The type of comparison to use for the maximum value.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的最大值的比较类型。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeType"></xref>, which indicates that the maximum comparison is not performed.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeType"> </xref>，表示不进行最大比较。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum value of the range.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置范围的最小值。

trans-unit.source: The type of comparison to use for the minimum value.
trans-unit.target: 要使用最小值的比较类型。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeType"></xref>, which indicates that the minimum comparison is not performed.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.RangeType"> </xref>，指示最小值比较，不执行。
